exercise.vraag: G. Gordon Liddy was associated with ...
exercise.toelichting: G. Gordon Liddy was een FBI agent undercover in het Witte Huis tijdens het Watergate schandaal.

Richard Nixon had gespioneerd op de Democratische Partij. Toen dit uitkwam heeft hij de eer aan zichzelf gehouden door zelf af te treden. Zijn vice-president Gerald Ford werd toen president. Jimmy Carter was de president na Gerald Ford.

toelichting.blockquote:
Mork & Mindy is an American sitcom that aired on ABC from September 14, 1978 to May 27, 1982. A spin-off after a highly successful episode of Happy Days, it starred Robin Williams as Mork, an extraterrestrial who comes to Earth from the planet Ork in a small, one-Orkan egg-shaped spaceship.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mork_%26_Mindy

blockquote.p: The repeatedly mentioned phrase "the day the music died" refers to the plane crash in 1959 that killed early rock and roll performers Buddy Holly, The Big Bopper, and Ritchie Valens.
